org.mapdb

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mapdb.Utils

  • public final class Utils
extends Object

    Various IO related utilities

    Author:
    Jan Kotek, Nathan Sweet wrote long packer utils

    • Method Detail

      • packLong

        public static void packLong(DataOutput out,
            long value)
                     throws IOException

        Pack non-negative long into output stream. It will occupy 1-10 bytes depending on value (lower values occupy smaller space)

        Parameters:
        out - DataOutput to put value into
        value - to be serialized, must be non-negative
        Throws:
        IOException

      • unpackLong

        public static long unpackLong(DataInput in)
                       throws IOException

        Unpack positive long value from the input stream.

        Parameters:
        in - The input stream.
        Returns:
        The long value.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • packInt

        public static void packInt(DataOutput in,
           int value)
                    throws IOException

        Pack non-negative long into output stream. It will occupy 1-5 bytes depending on value (lower values occupy smaller space)

        Parameters:
        in - DataOutput to put value into
        value - to be serialized, must be non-negative
        Throws:
        IOException

      • unpackInt

        public static int unpackInt(DataInput is)
                     throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

        clone value using serialization

      • arrayPut

        public static Object[] arrayPut(Object[] array,
                int pos,
                Object value)

        expand array size by 1, and put value at given position. No items from original array are lost

      • arrayLongPut

        public static long[] arrayLongPut(long[] array,
                  int pos,

      • nextPowTwo

        public static int nextPowTwo(int value)

        Compute nearest bigger power of two

      • tempDbFile

        public static File tempDbFile()

        Create temporary file in temp folder. All associated db files will be deleted on JVM exit.

      • isWindows

        public static boolean isWindows()

        check if Operating System is Windows

      • isAndroid

        public static boolean isAndroid()

        check if Operating System is Android

      • JVMSupportsLargeMappedFiles

        public static boolean JVMSupportsLargeMappedFiles()

        Check if large files can be mapped into memory. For example 32bit JVM can only address 2GB and large files can not be mapped, so for 32bit JVM this function returns false.

      • checkMapValueIsNotCollecion

        public static void checkMapValueIsNotCollecion(Object value)
